name: Royal Arena
description:
Royal arena is a small battle game made in Pixelbox.js, a fantasy console, the game can only be played with controllers and two players, the goal of the game is to stab the sword on the enemy player's back.  (This game was made under 48 Hours)

(Keyboard controls are not supported and can only be played with two controllers)

The controls are very simple, it only consists of moving the character and the sword points in the direction you're moving, if the swords collide the swords clash and get sent back or keep clashing

Thanks for playing, Enjoy
